introduction_english: The word we'll be learning in this section is えきたい which you will often hear in scientific discussions, cooking, and daily life when talking about different forms of matter.
meaning_explanation_english: The word "ekitai" means "liquid." It refers to a substance that flows freely and takes the shape of its container, like water or oil. In everyday usage, it's a way to describe anything in liquid form, as opposed to solid or gas.
kanji_explanation: This word is usually written in kana, so there are no kanji to explain.
synonyms: 流体 : りゅうたい : fluid
synonym_explanation: The most common synonyms of the word "えきたい" are "えき" and "りゅうたい." "えき" is more commonly used to refer to liquids in the context of volumes or amounts, while "りゅうたい" can include both liquids and gases, highlighting their ability to flow.
antonym_explanation: The most common antonyms of the word "えきたい" are "こたい" and "きたい." "こたい" refers to solids, which have a fixed shape, solidifying the contrast with "えきたい." "きたい" refers to gases, distinguished by their ability to expand and fill containers more than liquids.

example_sentences.furigana: 液体(えきたい)の力(ちから)は強(つよ)いです。

translations.EN: The power of the liquid is strong.
translations.ES: El poder del líquido es fuerte.
translations.VI: Sức mạnh của chất lỏng thì mạnh.
translations.FR: La puissance du liquide est forte.
translations.TL: Ang lakas ng likido ay malakas.
translations.MY: အရည်တခုရဲ့ အစွမ်းထက်တယ်။

example_sentences.furigana: 薬(くすり)を液体(えきたい)で飲(の)みます。

translations.EN: I take medicine in liquid form.
translations.ID: Saya minum obat dalam bentuk cair.
translations.ES: Tomo la medicina en forma líquida.
translations.VI: Tôi uống thuốc ở dạng lỏng.
translations.FR: Je prends le médicament sous forme liquide.
translations.TL: Umiinom ako ng gamot sa anyong likido.
translations.MY: ကုထုံးကိုအရည်ကြည်ဖွယ်သောက်သည္။
translations.HI: मैं दवा को तरल रूप में लेता हूँ।
translations.FA: دارو را به صورت مایع مصرف می‌کنم.

example_sentences.furigana: 液体(えきたい)を見る(みる)。

translations.MY: အရည်ကိုကြည့်ပါ။

example_sentences.furigana: 彼(かれ)は液体(えきたい)を飲(の)みます。

translations.VI: Anh ấy uống chất lỏng đó.
translations.MY: သူသည် အရည်ကို သောက်သည်။

example_sentences.kanji: 液体の中にオレンジジュースがあります。
example_sentences.furigana: 液体(えきたい)の中(なか)にオレンジジュースがあります。

translations.EN: There is orange juice in the liquid.
translations.ID: Ada jus jeruk di dalam cairan itu.
translations.ES: Hay jugo de naranja en el líquido.
translations.VI: Có nước cam trong chất lỏng.
translations.FR: Il y a du jus d'orange dans le liquide.
translations.BN: তরল পদার্থের মধ্যে কমলা জুস আছে।
translations.TL: May kakahuwaang orange juice sa loob ng likido.
translations.MY: အရည်ထဲမှာ လိပ္ပြာသီးရည်ရှိပါတယ်။
translations.HI: तरल में संतरे का जूस है।
translations.FA: در مایعات آب پرتقال وجود دارد.
